name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quicktick - The web3 layer for Twitter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quicktick brings live cryptocurrency prices, insights, and one-click NFT minting to Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quicktick lets you hover & bookmark crypto tickers on Twitter for realtime insights. You can also get information on contract addresses. 

How to use it? 
1Ô∏è‚É£ Click the "Add to Chrome" button above.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Go to twitter.com (also called x.com).
3Ô∏è‚É£ Hover any cashtag or contract address on Twitter, such as $btc or $eth, for info about price, market cap, volume and other realtime data.

üöÄ We will add features on a weekly basis to make Quicktick the easiest way to get an edge on realtime crypto information via Twitter!
